name: The Guardian (whiestar, JCAmaya, ElGoblinRojo, Claverias, Joenoror)
name_original: The Guardian (whiestar, JCAmaya, ElGoblinRojo, Claverias, Joenoror)
description:
This is a little game that talks about our childhood. That when we are kids, we see the world in a different way.

Join us in this amazing journey and let's live again those beautiful moments of our life.
 

Press WASD or the Arrows to move, press  SPACE to jump, move the  mouse to rotate the camera and right click to interact.

Music from: https://www.purple-planet.com/

Fonts from: https://www.fontsquirrel.com/

This game was done as part of Global Game Jam 2019.
